story.title: CPS Public Hearing: Best Practice High School
story.description: A hearing for the technical closing of Best Practice High School. This school has already been phased out and no longer has students. Held on the 15th floor of the Chicago Public Schools administration building. Wednesday, January 25th, 2012 5:30 - 7:30 PM. 4 public speakers.

author.name: Josh Kalov
author.bio: Fan of education, politics, better government, open source software, sports, & most things peanut butter related.

data.text: Best Practice High School was originally opened in 1995. Quoting from Amazon.com: "In 1995, Marilyn helped found the Best Practice High School, a 450-student Chicago Public School that demonstrates on a daily basis, that classroom methodology can make a difference for kids and teachers." A book was written detailing the opening of this school. http://www.amazon.com/Rethinking-High-School-Practice-Leadership/dp/0325003246

quote.text: I'm at Chicago Public Schools (125 S Clark St., Adams, Chicago) http://4sq.com/xe5e29

meta.text: I'm at Chicago Public Schools (125 S Clark St., Adams, Chicago) http://t.co/FRRQ0GOd

quote.text: Decided to see what the @ChiPubSchools school closing hearings are like.

meta.text: Decided to see what the @ChiPubSchools school closing hearings are like.

quote.text: @shua123 @chipubschools -- Who's the hearing officer, and where is he/she from (e.g., law firm, agency, etc.)?

meta.text: @shua123 @chipubschools -- Who's the hearing officer, and where is he/she from (e.g., law firm, agency, etc.)?

quote.text: @shua123 - CPS used to use its outside lawyers as "independent" hearing officers, but I don't believe CPS can do that anymore. Worth asking.

meta.text: @shua123 - CPS used to use its outside lawyers as "independent" hearing officers, but I don't believe CPS can do that anymore. Worth asking.

quote.text: . @mifarmer Yes, the hearing officer for the Best Practices hearing was Judge Carl McCormick http://ow.ly/8GKZn (bio) #cps

meta.text: . @mifarmer Yes, the hearing officer for the Best Practices hearing was Judge Carl McCormick http://t.co/dv8uvJaS (bio) #cps

quote.text: "any speaker deserves our respect. " #cps

meta.text: "any speaker deserves our respect. " #cps

quote.text: "as society we would be at loss if someone was too intimidated to share their thoughts. " #cps

meta.text: "as society we would be at loss if someone was too intimidated to share their thoughts. " #cps

quote.text: RT @shua123: "as society we would be at loss if someone was too intimidated to share their thoughts. " #cps

meta.text: RT @shua123: "as society we would be at loss if someone was too intimidated to share their thoughts. " #cps

quote.text: @shua123 hahahaha! They don't practice what they preach, personally or professionally.

meta.text: @shua123 hahahaha! They don't practice what they preach, personally or professionally.

quote.text: @shua123 Like abused charter teachers so afraid for their jobs they won't talk to me on the record about their atrocious working conditions.

meta.text: @shua123 Like abused charter teachers so afraid for their jobs they won't talk to me on the record about their atrocious working conditions.

quote.text: Everything is being recorded ("court reporter") doesn't seem to be video or audio

meta.text: Everything is being recorded ("court reporter") doesn't seem to be video or audio

quote.text: Michelle Hurley now speaking

meta.text: Michelle Hurley now speaking

quote.text: Submitting documents, reading table of contents. Very law formal so far. #cps

meta.text: Submitting documents, reading table of contents. Very law formal so far. #cps

quote.text: There is a projector & monitors but so far nothing on screen other than hearing name & date. #cps

meta.text: There is a projector & monitors but so far nothing on screen other than hearing name & date. #cps

quote.text: This room is set up so that the person in charge of the hearing feels far away from audience. #cps http://ow.ly/i/qHHP

meta.text: This room is set up so that the person in charge of the hearing feels far away from audience. #cps http://t.co/y7HDYCfB

quote.text: @shua123 I'm pretty sure that's by design...

meta.text: @shua123 I'm pretty sure that's by design...

quote.text: @shazrasul not sure. Its just a very big square room with fixed projectors & 2 unfortunately located massive support columns

meta.text: @shazrasul not sure. Its just a very big square room with fixed projectors & 2 unfortunately located massive support columns

quote.text: @shua123 I've been in that room for hearings, it's designed to minimize the sizeof the audience...

meta.text: @shua123 I've been in that room for hearings, it's designed to minimize the sizeof the audience...

quote.text: @shazrasul hard for me to tell. Too small a crowd for this. It looks like enough seats for around 180-200 maybe.

meta.text: @shazrasul hard for me to tell. Too small a crowd for this. It looks like enough seats for around 180-200 maybe.

quote.text: "CEOs compiled record" submitted to the hearing record. Record stays open so public can submit items in next 24 hrs to hearing officer

meta.text: "CEOs compiled record" submitted to the hearing record. Record stays open so public can submit items in next 24 hrs to hearing officer

quote.text: CEO representative Mr Adam Anderson speaking now in support of proposal.

meta.text: CEO representative Mr Adam Anderson speaking now in support of proposal.

quote.text: Students finished leaving school before phaseout timeline completed.

meta.text: Students finished leaving school before phaseout timeline completed.

quote.text: Woah, it's a graph showing the decreasing enrollment.!

meta.text: Woah, it's a graph showing the decreasing enrollment.!

quote.text: @shua123 As an optimist says, somewhere in all this horse s****, there's bound to be a pony somewhere (eg a kid!)

meta.text: @shua123 As an optimist says, somewhere in all this horse s****, there's bound to be a pony somewhere (eg a kid!)

quote.text: Hearing officer is asking a lot of questions for clarification of #cps people.

meta.text: Hearing officer is asking a lot of questions for clarification of #cps people.

data.text: I was impressed by his asking follow up questions of everyone that spoke (both CPS people and the public). He seemed very interested in learning specifics. I'm sure if it had been a crowded hearing with more than 4 public speakers there wouldn't have been enough time to go that in depth though.

quote.text: Public comment time...

meta.text: Public comment time...

quote.text: CAUSE representative speaking, opposing all closings, phaseout, & turnouts.

meta.text: CAUSE representative speaking, opposing all closings, phaseout, & turnouts.

quote.text: "Charters create a have & have-not situation"

meta.text: "Charters create a have & have-not situation"

quote.text: Asking why not transformations instead of turnarounds/closings

meta.text: Asking why not transformations instead of turnarounds/closings

quote.text: @shua123 I love that word: "transformations."

meta.text: @shua123 I love that word: "transformations."

quote.text: Hearing officer now asking followup Q's to first speaker.

meta.text: Hearing officer now asking followup Q's to first speaker.

quote.text: @shua123 are you at CPS or is this streaming?

meta.text: @shua123 are you at CPS or is this streaming?

quote.text: @lindalutton at CPS

meta.text: @lindalutton at CPS

quote.text: @lindalutton this is something @ChiPubSchools should be streaming though...

meta.text: @lindalutton this is something @ChiPubSchools should be streaming though...

quote.text: @shua123 @ChiPubSchools This sure is something they should stream. Same w/ the bd meetings.

meta.text: @shua123 @ChiPubSchools This sure is something they should stream. Same w/ the bd meetings.

quote.text: 2nd speaker now talking about child with learning disability. "I don't know what is going to become of him. "

meta.text: 2nd speaker now talking about child with learning disability. "I don't know what is going to become of him. "

data.text: While this father's concerns were not ultimately related to this hearing, the hearing officer made sure that someone from CPS would stay around after to speak with him and help him with his concerns.

quote.text: Substance news talking about location of meeting not in neighborhood

meta.text: Substance news talking about location of meeting not in neighborhood
